sentences.english: When Sin claps his broad wings over the battle.
sentences.chinese: 當罪惡煽動巨翼在戰鬥中肆虐。

sentences.english: We outrage at the sinful violation of the poeple's interests and rights.
sentences.chinese: 我們對侵犯人民利益和權利的罪惡行經表示強烈憤慨。

sentences.english: The son overthrew father, but he would be repenting forever and crime sense followed the son.
sentences.chinese: 兒子推翻父親，但伴隨兒子的將是永遠懺悔和罪惡感。

sentences.english: And the LORD said, Because the cry of Sodom and Gomorrah is great, and because their sin is very grievous;
sentences.chinese: 耶和華說，所多瑪和蛾摩拉的罪惡甚重，聲聞於我。

sentences.english: I have sent a cable describing the wickedness of that infamous organization.
sentences.chinese: 我發了個電報，報道了那個臭名昭彰的組織的罪惡。

sentences.english: And because of his sinful life, Jada attained the body of a ghost.
sentences.chinese: 由於他罪惡的一生，加達得到了一個鬼魂的軀體。

sentences.english: And what is the root problem of sin?
How to get rid of the guilt feeling?
He stressed the corruptions of sin.
A theodicy of course is a response to the problem of evil.
sentences.chinese: 神義論自然是對罪惡問題的迴應。

sentences.english: This is one reason the corporate thuggery that is destroying the rainforests is so criminal.
sentences.chinese: 所以商業公司破壞雨林的屠殺是如此的罪惡。

sentences.english: It is anti Japanese and anti-imperialist;
sentences.chinese: 帝國主義和殖民主義是雙重的罪惡。

sentences.english: So perhaps guilt is good after all.
sentences.chinese: 歸根到底，也許罪惡感是個好東西。

sentences.english: Day after day my men and I straggle to hold back a tidal wave of crime.
sentences.chinese: 一天又一天，我和我的人努力抑制罪惡的浪潮。

sentences.english: O Liberty, Liberty, how many crimes are committed in thy name!
sentences.chinese: 自由，自由，多少的罪惡假汝之名而行﹗。

sentences.english: Should we only fall silent in revulsion, shame, and guilt?
sentences.chinese: 我們應當僅僅在厭惡，羞恥和罪惡中保持沉默嗎？

definition: to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
